channel.title: Remove Accidental Complexity
channel.description: Rants of an Old Networking Geek
channel.author: Andrés Gasson

item.title: re-start blog
item.description:
Trying out cryogen

After a lapse of a few years, I am now trying to get my notes updated with my new flavour of programming language - clojure. So trying out the static blogger cyrogen which I hope can help me get my notes up to date.

Lets us see how easy and automated it is. Alos will need to sort out my git skills.

Gas.
item.author: Andrés Gasson
